description: Due to limitations of External Accessories, this accesssory requires Homebridge restart to reload configuration.

debug.title: Debug
debug.description: Enables additional output in the log.

configVersion.title: Configuration Version
configVersion.description: Configuration Version, used for potential migration between major plugin versions

name.title: TV's Name
name.description: The HomeKit name of your TV.

ip.title: TV's IP Address
ip.description: The IP Address of your TV.

macAddress.title: TV's MAC Address
macAddress.description: The MAC Address of your TV. Used to wake TV over WiFi. WoWiFi have to be enabled on TV in network settings.

apiUser.title: Philips API username
apiUser.description:
Username for Philips TV API. To be generated by pairing. 
 More information: https://github.com/suborb/philips_android_tv

apiPass.title: Philips API password
apiPass.description:
Password for Philips TV API. To be generated by pairing. 
 More information: https://github.com/suborb/philips_android_tv

apiVersion.title: Philips API Version
apiVersion.description: API version used for communication with TV. Modifies URL in requests. Plugin have no version checks right now.

wakeUntilAPIReadyCounter.title: Wake until API ready counter
wakeUntilAPIReadyCounter.description: Number of tries to connect to TV before giving up at startup or turning on. Default 100. If -1 used - unlimited.

alternativePlayPause.title: Alternative Play Pause.
alternativePlayPause.description: If enabled plugin will send store state of last send command and send Play command or Pause command alternating. If disabled, plugin sends PlayPause command. Required for compatibility on selected Philips TV.

dedicatedMuteSwitch.title: Dedicated Mute Switch
dedicatedMuteSwitch.description: If enabled plugin register additional Switch Service that will mute, or unmute TV. Might be useful when setting scenes.

dedicatedVolumeLightbulb.title: Dedicated Volume Lightbulb
dedicatedVolumeLightbulb.description: If enabled plugin register additional Lightbulb Service that will control Volume of TV. Might be useful when setting scenes. Please be aware that plugin regardless provides TV speaker service (usable in iOS Remote Widget)

useFavorites.title: Use favorites from TV
useFavorites.description: If enabled plugin will load the favorite channels from the tv as homekit input sources.

favoriteListId.title: Favorite List ID
favoriteListId.description: Which List shall be used by plugin? By default use 1

includeAll.title: Use all channels from TV
includeAll.description: If enabled plugin will load all channels from TV as homekit input sources

channels.title: List of Channels that will be added as Input in HomeKit.

apps.title: List of Applications
apps.description: List of Applications that will be added as Input in HomeKit.
